thread.title: Telegram CEO App briefly blocked in Iran after spy request
thread.title_full: Telegram CEO App briefly blocked in Iran after spy request

title: Telegram CEO App briefly blocked in Iran after spy request
text:
Telegram CEO: App briefly blocked in Iran after spy request 
Associated Press Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
DUBAI, United Arab Emirates (AP) -- Iranian officials briefly blocked access to the smartphone messaging application Telegram, its founder and CEO says, making it the latest social media outlet to be targeted by authorities in the Islamic Republic....
